name: My 1st Millionaire Quiz | Mixed 15 Questions | 15 Questions

questions.text: What does a pH level measure?
If Christmas Day is on Saturday, then the following New Year's Day is on which day of the week?
Which of these holidays is not attached to a specific date in the US?
What famous radio personality was also the voice of Shaggy on the cartoon 'Scooby-Doo'?
Which of these words is a synonym for 'perambulate'?
Who was the first American in space?
In ice hockey, which of the following is not a penalty?
On the TV show 'Hill Street Blues' what is Joyce Davenport's nickname for Captain Frank Furillo?
What part of the world was once known as Cathay?
Where is the Frank Lloyd Wright-designed house known as 'Falling Water'?
Which of these sentences is written in the subjunctive?
questions.correct: I wish I were your man
questions.explanation: I wish I were your man.

questions.text: Where was the chicken first domesticated, of these choices?
